channel.description: Access Okta APIs with user’s credentials Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Implement OAuth for Okta: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/implement-oauth-for-okta/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. They tend to walk the reader through administrative tasks but not exclusively.
